      • addEnemyToLevelAutomatically

        public java.lang.String addEnemyToLevelAutomatically​(java.lang.String randomId,
                                                     int randomType,
                                                     java.lang.String randomNameType,
                                                     int randomScoreUp,
                                                     int randomScoreDown,
                                                     int randomPosX,
                                                     int randomPosY,
                                                     int initLevel)
        addEnemyToLevelAutomatically adds an enemy to a level.
        Parameters:
        randomId - represents the enemy id.
        randomType - represents the enemy type.
        randomNameType - represents the enemy name according to the type.
        randomScoreUp - represents the score obtained by defeating the enemy.
        randomScoreDown - represents the score obtained when defeated by the enemy.
        randomPosX - represents the enemy X position.
        randomPosY - represents the enemy Y position.
        initLevel - represents the enemy level to add.
        Returns:
        msj represents the register message.

                                                        int initLevel)
        addTreasureToLevelAutomatically adds a new treasure.

        randomNameType - represents the treasure name.
        randomImage - represents the treasure url image.
        randomUnits - represents the treasure units.
        randomScore - represents the treasure score.

        randomPosY - represents the treasure Y positions.

        Returns:
